item.title: RPI To Induct Six New Members Into Athletics Hall of Fame
item.description: TROY, N.Y. - The Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (RPI) Athletics Hall of Fame Selection Committee has chosen six former student-athletes for induction into the Athletics Hall of Fame. item.title: Volunteer for Commencement 2025
item.description: We’re looking for volunteers who will help make Commencement memorable for our graduates and their families. This year’s Commencement ceremony will be held on Saturday, May 10, at 8:30 a.m. in the East Campus Athletic Village stadium. To volunteer, please fill out the volunteer form no later than Friday, April 18. Thank you for your consideration, and we hope you can join us to celebrate the Class of 2025!

item.title: iEAR Presents! Suzi Analogue to speak at EMPAC on April 10
item.description: Suzi Analogue’s recent project commissioned by Alfreda Cinema and Brooklyn Academy of Music, BY ANY MEANZ SONICALLY, is a live electronic score set to a visual montage highlighting profound influence of Black women in electronic dance music, tracing their impact from the early roots in jazz and rhythm & blues to the global prominence of dance music today. Suzi will present her work as producer, educator, and cultural shape shifter. Join us from 2pm-5pm in EMPAC Studio Beta.

item.title: 2025 Romesh Diwan Lecture Series, The Economics Department Welcomes Guest Speaker Dr. Alfonso Flores-Lagunes | April 11
item.description: Higher schooling attainment is associated with better cognitive function at older ages, but it remains unclear whether the relationship is causal. This talk will present and discuss recent results that aim to pin down the causal part of this association using nonparametric bounds. Join the talk on April 11 in TROY 2018 from 2pm-3:15pm.
